s0001: Jin Tang Shu Yu, Zhou Wu Wang son and Cheng Wang younger brother.
s0002: Initially, Wu Wang with Shu Yu mother met time, dreamed heaven told Wu Wang said: 'I command give birth son, name Yu, I grant him Tang.'
s0003: And gave birth son, writing on his hand said 'Yu', so then because commanded him called Yu.
s0004: Wu Wang collapsed, Cheng Wang established, Tang had disorder, Zhou Gong executed extinguished Tang.
s0005: Cheng Wang with Shu Yu played, cut paulownia leaf made gui to grant Shu Yu, said: 'With this enfeoff you.'
s0006: Shi Yi because requested choose day establish Shu Yu.
s0007: Cheng Wang said: 'I with him played.'
s0008: Shi Yi said: 'Heavenly son no play words.
s0009: Words then historian writes it, ritual completes it, music sings it.'
s0010: Then enfeoffed Shu Yu at Tang.
s0011: Tang at Yellow River, Fen River east, square hundred li, so called Tang Shu Yu.
s0012: Surname Ji Shi, style Zi Yu.
s0013: Tang Shu son Xie, this was Jin Hou.
s0014: Jin Hou son Ning Zu, this was Wu Hou.
s0015: Wu Hou son Fu Ren, this was Cheng Hou.
s0016: Cheng Hou son Fu, this was Li Hou.
s0017: Li Hou son Yi Jiu, this was Jing Hou.
s0018: Jing Hou since then, years can calculate.
s0019: From Tang Shu to Jing Hou five generations, no their year numbers.
s0020: Jing Hou seventeenth year, Zhou Li Wang confused tyrannical cruel, country people made disorder, Li Wang exited fled to Zhi, ministers administered government, so called 'Republican'.
s0021: Eighteenth year, Jing Hou died, son Xi Hou Si Tu established.
s0022: Xi Hou fourteenth year, Zhou Xuan Wang initially established.
s0023: Eighteenth year, Xi Hou died, son Xian Hou Ji established.
s0024: Xian Hou eleventh year died, son Mu Hou Fei Wang established.
s0025: Mu Hou fourth year, took Qi woman Jiang Shi as wife.
s0028: Tenth year, attacked Qian Mu, had merit.
s0029: Gave birth young son, named Cheng Shi.
s0030: Jin person Shi Fu said: 'Strange, lord's naming son!
s0031: Crown prince called Qiu, Qiu means enemy.
s0032: Young son called Cheng Shi, Cheng Shi great name, one who completes it.
s0035: Now legitimate concubine names contrary, this after Jin its able not disorder?'
s0037: Twenty-seventh year, Mu Hou died, younger brother Shang Shu self established, crown prince Qiu exited fled.
s0038: Shang Shu third year, Zhou Xuan Wang collapsed.
s0039: Fourth year, Mu Hou crown prince Qiu led his followers attacked Shang Shu established, this was Wen Hou.
s0040: Wen Hou tenth year, Zhou You Wang without way, Quan Rong killed You Wang, Zhou east moved.
s0041: And Qin Xiang Gong began ranked as feudal lords.
s0042: Thirty-fifth year, Wen Hou Qiu died, son Zhao Hou Bo established.
s0043: Zhao Hou first year, enfeoffed Wen Hou younger brother Cheng Shi at Qu Wo.
s0044: Qu Wo city greater than Yi.
s0046: Cheng Shi enfeoffed Qu Wo, numbered Huan Shu.
s0047: Jing Hou concubine grandson Luan Bin assisted Huan Shu.
s0048: Huan Shu at this time age fifty-eight, good virtue, Jin country's crowd all attached to him.
s0049: Jun Zi said: 'Jin disorder its at Qu Wo.
s0050: Branch greater than root obtains people's hearts, not disorder what wait!'
